title: Take 80 percent off Apple’s AirTag Leather Key Ring with this insane deal
content:
Macworld

There are two things wrong with Apple’s new FineWoven key rings—they’re easily scratched and they’re too expensive. But today you can get the discontinued leather version for a whopping 80 percent off—Amazon’s Woot is selling a 2-pack of the leather key ring for AirTag in the Meyer Lemon color for just $15, a savings of $55 and the best price we’ve ever seen.

The leather AirTag key ring holder is as simple as it gets—a loop attaches to a stainless steel ring that easily attaches to anything with a hole. Your AirTag will fit snugly in place and a button makes sure it won’t fall out when jostled. This version is named Mayer Lemon and comes in a dark yellow hue.

In short, it fixes the biggest problem with the AirTag: you can’t attach it to anything. So go grab a set and make your AirTags way more practical. And

Get two AirTag leather key rings for $15
View Deal at Woot
iPhone
